changes: Bugfix: Fixed an issue where the 'Disable auto-hurdle' setting was not being loaded from localStorage.
Bugfix: Fixed an issue where the 'Disable auto-hurdle' setting was not being saved to localStorage.
Feature: Added a 'Disable auto-hurdle' checkbox to the Gameplay tab and connected it to localStorage.
Bugfix: Corrected an import error by adding `highScoresContainer` to the exports in `dom-elements.js`.
Bugfix: Resolved an import error for `initializeUI` by creating a new `initializeUI` function in `js/ui.js` that encapsulates the UI initialization logic and is properly exported.
Bugfix: Resolved a 404 error for `version.js` by removing the incorrect import from `js/main.js` and hardcoding the version number.
Feature: Integrated `actions.js` and `drawing.js` into the animation logic.
Improvement: Centralized keyboard and touch event handling in `js/main.js`.
Bugfix: Removed duplicated function definitions in `js/game-modules/main.js`.
Bugfix: Resolved a syntax error in `actions.js` caused by git conflict markers.
Bugfix: Resolved a syntax error in `state.js` caused by git conflict markers.
Bugfix: Resolved a syntax error in `drawing.js` caused by git conflict markers.
Feature: Implemented backflip and frontflip animations with keyboard ('Z', 'F') and mobile gesture controls (Swipe Up for Frontflip, Swipe Right for Backflip).
Feature: Added a Houdini-style animation with keyboard ('I') and mobile gesture controls (3-Finger Tap).
Feature: Integrated jumping motion into all special move animations for obstacle clearance.
Feature: Added win/loss sound effects (fx/winner.mp3 and fx/quack.mp_3 as placeholder for loser sound).
Bugfix: Resolved animation defect where rotational animations only affected limbs, not the entire body.
Improvement: Remapped mobile gestures to accommodate new animations (Power Stomp to Swipe Down, Dive to 2-Finger Tap).
Improvement: Updated in-game info panel to reflect new keyboard and mobile controls.
Improvement: Adjusted 'City Roadway' theme: Lighter sky color for a distinct horizon, added a black curb line above road lines, and adjusted yellow road lines for better visual spacing.
Improvement: Repositioned 'Power-up >>' animation to display at the bottom inside the gameCanvas.
